feed_links.title: Primary Race That Could Tip Senate; Real Estate Fees Crushed By AntiTrust | MR Live
feed_links.summary:
Fun Half Link: https://youtube.com/live/KKK3NM-dekk?feature=share

3/19/24 - It's News Day Tuesday! Sam and Emma break down the biggest headlines of the day. But first they speak with David  Dayen, executive editor at the American Prospect, to discuss his recent piece regarding The National Association of Realtors decision to end their practice of 6% agent commission sales for residential home sales.

Check out David's piece here: https://prospect.org/justice/2024-03-18-landmark-settlement-breaks-up-real-estate-cartel/

feed_links.title: How Copyright Mutated To Benefit Corporations w/ David Bellos | MR Live
feed_links.summary:
Fun Half Link: https://youtube.com/live/rMiBR2bEXy8?feature=share

 3/18/24 - Happy Monday! Sam and Emma speak with David Bellos, professor of Comparative Literature at Princeton University, to discuss his recent book Who Owns This Sentence?: A History of Copyrights and Wrongs, co-authored with Alexandre Montagu.

Check out David's book here: https://fit.princeton.edu/publications/who-owns-sentence-history-copyrights-and-wrongs
